# Core Rasa Framework
rasa
rasa-sdk

# Voice Integration
SpeechRecognition  # For capturing and processing voice input
gTTS              # For converting text-to-speech (Google Text-to-Speech)
playsound          # For playing back audio files
pyaudio            # Required by SpeechRecognition for microphone input
requests           # For sending and receiving data between bot and scripts
loguru             # For enhanced logging 
pytest
